channel.title: Python on Caleb Key
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Caleb Key

item.title: Calebstone
item.description: Developed a card-based strategy card game featuring a Godot frontend and Flask backend, enhanced with reinforcement learning models that allow AI agents to autonomously play against each other.

item.title: HDR
item.description: Built a digit recognition system with a custom neural network from scratch, achieving 95% accuracy on the MNIST dataset. Included a Tkinter-based UI for real-time digit drawing and inference.
